alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Yakutat (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 19 at 5:31AM AKDT until October 19 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph shifting to the southwest with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...City and Borough of Yakutat. * WHEN...until 4 PM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are expected to increase this morning as the approaching low shifts winds to a more southernly direction. A wind shift to the SW Wednesday afternoon is also expected to bring in another period of high winds.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
